fieldUpdates.description: Qualtrics survey: flag needed for survey flow when CS Inquiry New Order cases go to "awaiting response - customer' status.
fieldUpdates.name: Case:Await.Cust.Response Flag = True

fieldUpdates.description: Qualtrics Surveys: field update that sets sent to qualtrics flag to true whenever a survey is triggered
fieldUpdates.name: Case:Sent To Qualtrics = TRUE

fieldUpdates.description: set the Unknown Email Address field as true
fieldUpdates.name: Case : Unknown Email Address As True

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( BEGINS(OwnerId, "005")&& Text(Owner:User.UserType)="PowerPartner", CP_Account_Primary_FSE__r.SVMXC__Salesforce_User__r.Email, IF( BEGINS(OwnerId, "005"), Owner:User.Manager.Email, IF( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Customer_Service" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Service_Orders" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Instrument_Service" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Billable" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Custom_Orders" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Service_Contracts", IF( Account.Territory_Region__c = "AMR", $Label.EmailRecipientCSQueue_AMR, IF( Account.Territory_Region__c = "EUR", $Label.EmailRecipientCSQueue_EUR, IF( Account.Territory_Region__c = "China", $Label.EmailRecipientCSQueue_GC, IF( Account.Territory_Region__c = "AMEA", $Label.EmailRecipientCSQueue_AMEA, $Label.EmailRecipientCSQueue_Global ) ) ) ), IF( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Technical_Support" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "China_Technical_Support" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Library_Preparation" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Instrumentation" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Analysis_Software" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Microarray" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_LIMS" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Clinical" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Informatics" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_CIS" || Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "QA_Review", IF( Account.Territory_Region__c = "AMR", $Label.EmailRecipientTSQueue_AMR, IF( Account.Territory_Region__c = "EUR", $Label.EmailRecipientTSQueue_EUR, IF( Account.Territory_Region__c = "China", $Label.EmailRecipientTSQueue_GC, IF( Account.Territory_Region__c = "AMEA", $Label.EmailRecipientTSQueue_AMEA, $Label.EmailRecipientTSQueue_Global ) ) ) ), "" ) ) ) )
fieldUpdates.name: SetPAE/PFAEmailRecipient
Set Case Origin to Web - MyIllumina CS
Set Case Owner to CS AMR Group
Set Case Owner to CS AMEA Group
Set Case Owner to CS EUR Group
Set Case Owner to CS GC Group
Set Case Owner to TS Group

fieldUpdates.description: DCP:326 : Update case status to closed
fieldUpdates.name: Set Case Status to Closed

fieldUpdates.description: updating the is case completed checkbox to false is to allow sending of email when case is reopen and completed again.
fieldUpdates.name: Set Is Case Completed to False

fieldUpdates.description: This field update changes the status of Case to Completed
fieldUpdates.name: Set Status to completed

outboundMessages.description: Qualtrics Surveys: Outbound message to send data to Qualtrics to generate surveys
outboundMessages.name: Qualtrics: CS Inquiries

outboundMessages.description: Qualtrics Surveys: Outbound message to send data to Qualtrics to generate surveys
outboundMessages.name: Qualtrics: TS/FS Business Issues

outboundMessages.description: Qualtrics Surveys: Outbound message to send data to Qualtrics to generate surveys - New Order
outboundMessages.name: Qualtrics: CS Inquiries - New Order

outboundMessages.description: Qualtrics Surveys: Outbound message to send data to Qualtrics to generate surveys
outboundMessages.name: Qualtrics: CP Business Issues

rules.fullName: Case %3A Case Origin Update When Email Received From MyIllumina Dashboard
rules.description: Set Case Origin to Web - My Illumina - CS When Email comes from MyIllumina-Dashboard@illumina.com.

rules.fullName: Case %3A CaseOwner-TS update upon CaseOrigin-TS
rules.description: Update CaseOwner to Technical Support if CaseOrigin is Web-MyIllumina-TS

rules.fullName: Case %3A CloseCompletedCase
rules.description: If a case has been marked as Complete and there are no pending work orders or parts orders then close the case Field Update : Set_Case_Status_to_Closed

rules.fullName: Case %3A Contact Is Blank
rules.description: mark the Unknown Email Address as checked if the contact is not found in Email to Case
rules.formula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - TS"),ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - CS")), OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "China_Technical_Support", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Technical_Support", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Customer_Service", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Globally_Unassigned_Email"), ISBLANK(ContactId) )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Description Is Changed
rules.description: Copying is done so the field can be added to list views, since standard description field can't be added to list views.
rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED( Description ), ISNEW() )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Email Routing to AMR Queue
rules.description: Emails should be routed to the queue when Inquiry case is received via email and account region AMR.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Record_Edit_Source__c ,"Clone Case SFM")),(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Customer_Service'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Inquiry', ISPICKVAL(Region__c,"AMR" ), ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email - CS'), ISNEW())

rules.fullName: Case %3A Email Routing to AMEA Queue
rules.description: Emails should be routed to the queue when Inquiry case is received via email and account region AMEA.
rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Record_Edit_Source__c ,"Clone Case SFM")),(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Customer_Service'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Inquiry', ISPICKVAL(Region__c,"AMEA" ), ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email - CS'), ISNEW())

rules.fullName: Case %3A Email Routing to EUR Queue
rules.description: Emails should be routed to the queue when Inquiry case is received via email and account region EUR.
rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Record_Edit_Source__c ,"Clone Case SFM")),(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Customer_Service'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Inquiry', ISPICKVAL(Region__c,"EUR" ), ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email - CS'), ISNEW())

rules.fullName: Case %3A Email Routing to GC Queue
rules.description: Emails should be routed to the queue when Inquiry case is received via email and account region GC.
rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Record_Edit_Source__c ,"Clone Case SFM")),(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Customer_Service' ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Inquiry', ISPICKVAL(Region__c,"China" ), ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email - CS'), ISNEW())

rules.fullName: Case %3A Email Routing to Unassigned Email Queue
rules.description: Emails should be routed to the queue when Inquiry case is received via email and cannot be assigned (i.e. there's no matching contact so account is not added)
rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Record_Edit_Source__c ,"Clone Case SFM")), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Customer_Service', ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email - CS'), ISPICKVAL(Priority , 'Medium'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Inquiry', ISPICKVAL(Region__c,'') )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Logistics Case for QA Review
rules.description: To check whether the status of case is Pending Logistics Review for 36 hours and closes the Case automatically.

rules.fullName: Case %3A Notify Customer on Case Closure when logged in user is CS
rules.description: To send an automated case closure email to the customer from CS user
rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileName_CustomerService, ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(Is_Case_Completed__c), Is_Case_Completed__c, Send_Case_Completion_Email__c, TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status)) != $Label.CaseStatusPendingLogisticsReview )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Notify Customer on Case Closure when logged in user is TS%2FFS
rules.description: To send an automated case closure email to the customer from TS and FS user
rules.formula: AND(OR($Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileName_FieldService, $Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileName_TechnicalSupport), ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(Is_Case_Completed__c), Is_Case_Completed__c, Send_Case_Completion_Email__c, TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status)) != $Label.CaseStatusPendingLogisticsReview )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Notify Customer on Case Creation when logged in user is CS
rules.description: Send email notification to Case Contact when Email to Case is created for Customer Service Queue
rules.formula: AND(OR(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Customer_Service", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Globally_Unassigned_Email") , ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - CS"), NOT(ISBLANK(ContactId)), OR( ISNEW(), AND( ISCHANGED( Unknown_Email_Address__c ), NOT( Unknown_Email_Address__c ) ) ) )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Notify QA For pAE Required Case
rules.description: To Notify QA when pAE/pFA is marked as Yes.
rules.formula: AND( OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c)), TEXT(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c)=$Label.CasePAEStatusYes, Record_Type__c=$Label.CaseRecordTypeBusinessIssue )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Origin Is Email
rules.description: Send email notification to Case Contact when Email to Case is created for Technical Support Queue
rules.formula: AND(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Technical_Support", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - TS"), NOT(ISBLANK(ContactId)), OR( ISNEW(), AND( ISCHANGED( Unknown_Email_Address__c ), NOT( Unknown_Email_Address__c ) ) ) )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Origin Is Email%28China technical support%29
rules.description: Send email notification to Case Contact when Email to Case is created for China Technical Support Queue
rules.formula: AND(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "China_Technical_Support", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - TS"), NOT(ISBLANK(ContactId)), OR( ISNEW(), AND( ISCHANGED( Unknown_Email_Address__c ), NOT( Unknown_Email_Address__c ) ) ) )

rules.fullName: Case %3A Owner Id is Changed
rules.description: workflow to populate PAE/PFA recipient email address when owner is changed
rules.formula: OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(OwnerId) )

rules.fullName: Case %3A PendingLogisticsReview with Unread Emails Not Eligible for QA
rules.description: To check whether the status of case is Pending Logistics Review for 36 hours and closes the Case automatically.

rules.fullName: Case %3A Review Comments Updated
rules.description: To Update the Case Last Reviewed field when Review comment is editted.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(QA_Review_Comments__c)

rules.fullName: Case %3A StatusIsCompleted
rules.description: This workflow rules checks for conditions on a Business Issue type of a case+subtype=general issue+Category=Logistics/supply chain and changes it's status to Pending Logistics Review when the status is changed to completed
rules.formula: AND( NOT(Entered_Pending_Logistics_Review__c), ISCHANGED( Status ) , TEXT(Status)=$Label.CaseStatusCompleted, RecordType.Name = $Label.CaseRecordTypeBusinessIssue, OR( AND( TEXT(Sub_Type__c)=$Label.CaseSubTypeGeneralIssue, OR( TEXT(Category__c)=$Label.CaseCategoryLogistics, TEXT(Category__c)=$Label.CaseCategoryShipping, TEXT(Category__c)=$Label.CaseCategoryPackaging ) ), Contains_Logistics_Analysis_Code__c ) )

rules.fullName: Case %3A StatusIsReopenedLogisticsInput Email owner
rules.description: DCP-3090: This workflow rules checks if case status is changed to Reopened - Logistics Input and sends an email to owner
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status ) , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Reopened - Logistics Input' ) )

rules.fullName: Case %3A To uncheck First Call Resolution on Case Reopen
rules.description: If the case is re-opened, First Call Resolution should get unchecked and should NOT be editable
rules.formula: AND( TEXT(Status) = 'Reopened - In Progress', ( First_Call_Resolution__c = true))

rules.fullName: Case %3A Unread Email is Checked on Closed Case
rules.description: To check if the Unread Email Check box is checked and sends email to case owner.
rules.formula: AND( Unread_Emails__c = true, OR ( TEXT(Status) = $Label.CaseStatusCompleted, TEXT(Status) = $Label.CaseStatusPendingLogisticsReview, TEXT(Status) = $Label.CaseStatusPendingQAReview, TEXT(Status) = $Label.CaseStatusClosed, TEXT(Status) = $Label.CaseStatusReopenRequested ), Owner:User.IsActive = true )

rules.fullName: Case %3A pAE Evaluation Required is Pending for CS Queue
rules.description: Send notifications to CS Queue DL if pAE evaluation is pending
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c, "Pending"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Answer_1__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Answer_2__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Answer_3__c , "")), NOT(IsClosed), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Business_Issue", OR(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Customer_Service", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Service_Orders", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Instrument_Service", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Billable", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Custom_Orders", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Service_Contracts"))

rules.fullName: Case %3A pAE Evaluation Required is Pending for TS Queue
rules.description: Send notifications to TS Queue DL if pAE evaluation is pending
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c, "Pending"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Answer_1__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Answer_2__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Answer_3__c , "")), NOT(IsClosed), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Business_Issue", NOT(ISBLANK(Owner:Queue.Id)), OR(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Technical_Support", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "China_Technical_Support", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Library_Preparation", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Instrumentation", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Analysis_Software", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Microarray", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_LIMS", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Clinical", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Informatics", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "X2nd_Level_Support", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_CIS", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "QA_Review") )

rules.fullName: Case %3A pAE Evaluation Required is Pending for User
rules.description: Send notifications to users if pAE evaluation is pending
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c, "Pending"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Answer_1__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Answer_2__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Answer_3__c , "")), NOT(IsClosed), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Business_Issue", BEGINS(OwnerId, "005") )

rules.fullName: Case %3A PFA Evaluation Required is Pending for CS Queue
rules.description: Send notifications to CS Queue DL if PFA evaluation is pending
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c, "Pending"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Answer_4__c , ""), ISPICKVAL(Answer_5__c , "")), NOT(IsClosed), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Business_Issue", OR(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Customer_Service", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Service_Orders", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Instrument_Service", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Billable", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Custom_Orders", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "CS_Service_Contracts"))

rules.fullName: Case %3A PFA Evaluation Required is Pending for TS Queue
rules.description: Send notifications to TS Queue DL if PFA evaluation is pending
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c, "Pending"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Answer_4__c , ""), ISPICKVAL(Answer_5__c , "")), NOT(IsClosed), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Business_Issue", NOT(ISBLANK(Owner:Queue.Id)), OR(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Technical_Support", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "China_Technical_Support", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Library_Preparation", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Instrumentation", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Analysis_Software", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Microarray", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_LIMS", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Clinical", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_Informatics", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "X2nd_Level_Support", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "TS_CIS", Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "QA_Review") )

rules.fullName: Case %3A PFA Evaluation Required is Pending for User
rules.description: Send notifications to users if PFA evaluation is pending
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c, "Pending"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Answer_4__c , ""), ISPICKVAL(Answer_5__c , "")), NOT(IsClosed), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Business_Issue", BEGINS(OwnerId, "005") )

rules.fullName: Case%3A Case First Reviewed Is Blank
rules.description: To Populate Case First Reviewed field when Review Comments field is first edited.
rules.formula: AND( ISBLANK( Case_First_Reviewed__c ), ISCHANGED(QA_Review__c) )

rules.fullName: Case%3A Case creation email
rules.description: This workflow will send case creation email to customer

rules.fullName: Case%3A Qualtrics Surveys %3A Set %27Awaiting Customer Response Flag%22 %3D True
rules.description: Case: Qualtrics Surveys : Set 'Awaiting Customer Response Flag" = True

rules.fullName: Case%3A Qualtrics Surveys%3A CS Inquiries
rules.booleanFilter: (2 and 4 and 8) AND ((1 AND 3 AND 5 ) OR ( 6 AND 7 AND 9))

criteriaItems.value: Change Order Confirmation,Conversion / Ship Schedule,MyIllumina,Order Expedite,Order Status,Question,Quotes,Response

rules.description: Qualtrics Surveys: WFR to trigger survey for CS Inquires that are NOT Order/New Order but Order/ *all but new order*.

rules.fullName: Case%3A Qualtrics Surveys%3A CS Inquiry%3A Order-New Order
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.description: Qualtrics Surveys: Workflow rule to trigger a survey on the closure of CS Inquiry Order/New Order cases

rules.fullName: Case%3A Subtype Is Changed
rules.description: To clear out "Complaint Reclassification Reason field" when subtype is changed from "General Issue" to "Complaint"
rules.formula: AND( TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Sub_Type__c)) = $Label.CaseSubTypeGeneralIssue, TEXT(Sub_Type__c) = $Label.CaseSubTypeComplaint )

rules.fullName: Case%3A setpAE%2FpFAEvaluationRequiredPending
rules.description: To populate PAE/PFA Evaluation Required pending if all the questions are not answered.
rules.formula: AND(TEXT(PAE_PFA_Evaluation_Required__c) != 'Pending', IVD_Product_Identifier__c = True, OR(TEXT(Answer_1__c) == '', TEXT(Answer_2__c) == '', TEXT(Answer_3__c) == '', TEXT(Answer_4__c) == '', TEXT(Answer_5__c) == '' ) )

rules.fullName: Case%3AQualtrics Surveys%3A TS%2FFS%3D Business Issue

criteriaItems.value: Phone - TS,Email - TS,Phone - Field,Email - Field,In Person - Field

rules.description: Case: Qualtrics Surveys: Send surveys to contacts on business issue cases with origin of phone-ts or email-ts.

rules.fullName: CaseCloseNotification
rules.description: DCP-1012: Reuest Reopen Denial Notification
rules.formula: NOT(ISBLANK( Reason_for_Approval_Denial_of_Reopen__c ))

rules.fullName: CaseOwner-CS update upon CaseOrigin-CS
rules.description: Update Case Owner to Global Customer Support if Case Origin in Web-MyIllumina-CS

rules.fullName: CaseReopenNotification
rules.description: DCP-1011 : Notify Super Users about Case Reopen

rules.fullName: UpdateCaseOriginforProactiveEmail
rules.description: US-254/US-258 To change the origin from Email - TS to Email - ProActive - TS for emails coming from Proactive email. Deactivating 5/10/2019 with Release 1.1 - Criteria is invalid and should be cleaned up.
